author: Juju Chang, Ashley Louszko, Jessica Hopper, Kristofer Rios, Cho Park
title: How essential workers who can't stay home are dealing with the coronavirus pandemic
description: From utility and sanitation workers to hospital cleaning staff and funeral home staff, the risks of coronavirus are apparent.
content:
Every day, Latisha Knight suits up at the suburban New York hospital where she works to fight the novel coronavirus. But she is not there to provide medication to patients or perform surgeries.
Knight is an environmental services employee who cleans and sani… [+10265 chars]
